metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Learn how to detect whether the browser is online or offline with JavaScript.
content.html: Learn how to detect whether the browser is online or offline with JavaScript.

content.text: The onLine property of the Navigator object returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the browser is in online or offline mode:
content.html: The onLine property of the Navigator object returns a Boolean value that specifies whether the browser is in online or offline mode:

syntaxHighlighting.text: var x = "Is the browser online? " + navigator.onLine;

content.code: var x = "Is the browser online? " + navigator.onLine;

content.text: Read more about the Navigator Object in our JavaScript Navigator Tutorial .
content.html: Read more about the Navigator Object in our JavaScript Navigator Tutorial.
